body:
Let me absolutely clear the [Bitcoin Forum](https://bitcoin.forum) going to declare all Bitcoin Core developers terrorists working to build software to launder money. Blockstream Inc., running here the show, thousands censored and attacked for saying the obvious. 

American, Australian and NATO associated countries infiltrated Bitcoin with they so called "developers" they destroyed the entire codebase, for years imposing on us so called layers like segwit, lightning which has absolutely nothing to do with Bitcoin.  

**Lightning is not Bitcoin**

Apart from that Bitcoin Core developers cheering when neo-nazi terrorist using lightning, a month ago El Salvador, now they focusing on Brasil's Bolsonaro. 

Scammers like Pompliano who shot Iraqi civilians in the head, now become a "Bitcoin streamer" followed by many Bitcoin Core developers. Peter McCormack, Alex Gladstein and other scammers are protected and promoted. 

![Nayib Bukele](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/87513632/136690062-52686056-7989-4019-921c-d52676fc424a.png)


Bitcoin Forum proposing a declaration about the **Independence of Bitcoin** and calling for a complete ban on Bitcoin Core. Bitcoin Core is NOT Bitcoin! 

Recently Bitcoin Core maniacs even changed the version number format of Bitcoin which was used ON PURPOSE by Satoshi Nakamoto, this repository is a scam.
title: Bitcoin Core is not Bitcoin! Neo-nazis and right-wing terrorists scammers from the USA and NATO countries completely taken over the Bitcoin repository
